name: A Mermaid's Request
description:
A broken mess of a bitsy game made for My first game jam 2018!

I ran into huge issue switching the files to another computer while out of town, so the dialogue isn't implemented, and the stuff that did import is..weird.

I plan to finish it up soon- but in the spirit of the game jam- here's the broken mess I made!

updates: 

8/25/2018 hey we have a cuter cover image now!

8/23/2018 updated the game! It's pretty much finished.
